job_history.work_description: Employee Management, New hire training, Hiring/Termination, Verbal and Written Notices, Writing and implementing department Policies, Management of Employee task assignments/follow-ups, Customer Service for Patient Accounts, Management Medicare and Medi-Cal, Insurance Appeals and Grevences, Hearings with the State and Federal Judge, CMS Updates and guidelines/trainings, Setting individual employee Goas/Achieving, Overseeing Patient Accounts to control Accounts Receivables, Managing and overseeing Medical Records/Archived records to keep compliance, CPT, HCPCS Coding, Keeping employees updated on HIPPA Compliance, Providing ongoing training and continuing education to my department employees, Overseeing Accounts Receivables, Working with Law Offices on Subpoena Requests, Maintaining department accuracy and cash flow of the company

Working closely with the President and the Vice President City and County Licenses, Applications, Updates of Ambulance Vehicles, adding/removing, EMT background check, DMV pull notice requests, Making sure Employee files are updated with licesnses and necessary documents at all times, Managing the Business Office, Medical Records Accounts Billable/Receivables Medicare/Insurance EOB's Contracts and Proposals, Writing Company policies, Updating the staff on HIPAA compliance, Checking EMT paperwork to make sure they comply with the law, Follow up with Dispatcher on calls, Checking Dr's Orders for ambulance transportation of Dialysis Patients to make sure they qualify for the service

Supervise the staff of Billing Department, Bookkeeping, Making sure everything is done by deadlines, Follow up with staff to check completeness of their tasks, Medicare, Medi-Cal, All Major Insurance Billing, Making Contracts with all Major Insurance Companies, EOB, Data Entry, Accounts Billable-Receiveable, Medicare, Medicaid, Insurance Re-Bills/F/u, Handled all the billing for 5yrs of two companies by myself, Coding CPT and ICD-9 HCPCS, Attending Medicare/Medi-Cal workshops and Updating of the Billing System

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in managing and supervising staff in various roles, indicating expert-level mastery in leadership.

skills.name: Employee Management
skills.explanation: Has handled employee management tasks such as new hire training, hiring/termination, and performance management, showing expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Policy Development
skills.explanation: Has experience in writing and implementing department policies, indicating strong proficiency in policy development.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has provided customer service for patient accounts, showing strong proficiency in customer service skills.

skills.name: Medical Records Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in managing and overseeing medical records to ensure compliance, indicating strong proficiency in medical records management.

skills.name: Coding (CPT, HCPCS, ICD-9)
skills.explanation: Has experience in coding for medical billing purposes, showing strong proficiency in coding skills.

skills.name: HIPAA Compliance
skills.explanation: Has experience in ensuring HIPAA compliance and providing training to staff, indicating strong proficiency in HIPAA compliance.

skills.name: Accounts Receivable Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in managing accounts receivable, showing strong proficiency in accounts receivable management.

skills.name: Billing and Insurance
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in billing and insurance, including Medicare, Medi-Cal, and major insurance companies, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Data Entry
skills.explanation: Has experience in data entry, showing solid working proficiency in data entry skills.

skills.name: Contract Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in making contracts with insurance companies, showing solid working proficiency in contract management.
